title: Coleen Rooney 'doesn't know who to trust' as Rebekah Vardy storm rages on
text:

Coleen Rooney is said to be feeling like she "doesn't know who to trust" after her online spat with Rebekah Vardy .

The wife of former England footballer Wayne went public with allegations that someone had been leaking stories from her private Instagram page.

She claimed the leaks had come from Rebekah's account, but Jamie Vardy's wife denied it was her and insisted many people had access to her page.

Now new! magazine reports Coleen has been left hurt by the Instagram furore.

A source told the publication: "This latest betrayal has hit Coleen hard.

"She's told loved ones she feels like she doesn't know who to trust."

(Image: SplashNews.com)

Rebekah vehemently denied she was the one who was leaking stories from Coleen's Instagram account, insisting many other people had access to her page.

She released a statement in response to Coleen's scathing post, explaining: "As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this.

"I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me to over the years can vouch for.

(Image: Getty Images)

"If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped.

"Over the years various people have had access to my insta & just this week I found I was following people I didn't know and have never followed myself.

"If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped.

"I'm not being funny but I don't need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you?

(Image: Twitter)

"I liked you a lot Coleen & I'm so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I'm heavily pregnant.

"I'm disgusted that I'm even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened."

Mirror Online has contacted a representative for Rebekah for comment.

description: Wayne Rooney's wife Coleen is said to have been left 'devastated' after stories were leaked from her private Instagram page
